title: Drawing, "Trial Lettering for Caption of Illustration, "Songs of War"", 1862
medium:
Recto: Graphite, brush and gray wash on paper
Verso: Graphite ? on paper
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Recto:   Horizontal view of a campfire with soldiers grouped about it.
Verso:  Trial lettering for caption of the illustration, "Songs of the War," published in Harper's Weekly, November 23, 1861.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Trial Lettering for Caption of Illustration, "Songs of War"", 1862.
1862. Recto: Graphite, brush and gray wash on paper
Verso: Graphite ? on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-132.
